channel.title: Eip Frameworks on Chao Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Eip Frameworks on Chao Yang

item.title: Apache Camel
item.description: Core concepts Endpoint it refers to an address or a software entity that supports communication. Component _it _is confusing terminology; EndpointFactory would have been more appropriate because a Component is a factory for creating Endpoint instances. A component has a name, which is the prefix of the URI. CamelContext the Camel runtime system. You typically have one CamelContext object in an application. CamelTemplate It’s previously called CamelClient. It can send a Message or Exchange to an endpoint.
